mapper.insert: insert into user( user_name, account, password, role_name, mail, pw_question, pw_answer )values ( #{userName}, #{account}, #{password}, #{roleName}, #{mail}, #{pwQuestion}, #{pwAnswer})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, account, password, role_name, mail, college_id, age, education, pw_question, pw_answer FROM user
SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.account, u.password, u.role_name, u.mail, u.college_id, u.age, u.education, u.pw_question, u.pw_answer FROM user u WHERE u.account = #{account}
insert into user( user_name, account, password, role_name, mail )values ( #{userName}, #{account}, #{password}, #{roleName}, #{mail} )

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.account, u.password, u.role_name, u.mail, u.college_id, c.college_name, c.faculty_name, u.age, u.education, u.pw_question, u.pw_answer FROM user u, college c WHERE u.account = #{account} and u.college_id = c.college_id
